ing: 2 heads   baby bok choy, cleaned and sliced
n: Almond and Baby Bok Choy Asian Salad
des: "This crispy salad uses authentic Asian ingredients and the sauce is delicious. If you can find mirin in an Asian grocery store, it makes it much more authentic and not too sweet."
ins: Whisk together the oil, vinegar, soy sauce, mirin, and sesame seeds in a small bowl, then set aside. Toss together the romaine, bok choy, carrot, almonds, and croutons in a large bowl. Pour the  dressing over the salad, toss to coat, and serve immediately.
